Subject: Re: [neat] Question about applicability of NEAT to a particular domain

Your problem reminded me of:

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Statistical_process_control

My instinct is that without stronger AI the best approach currently is
probably going to be a customised statistical analysis approach.
Floating threshold levels (which SPC uses if my memory serves me) are
simple to implement and maybe build up from there. I guess if you have
several metrics being measured then an ANN could be used to look for
patterns across those metrics. To learn on the fly you'll need to have
some background process analysing past log output, with a fitness
metric based on human tagged 'events'.

Colin.
